title: What Color is it
summary: Ever want to convert the current time to a color?
description: "What Color is it" takes the current time, converts it to a color for the background color, and then searches a database of more than 1,000 color names (more to be added soon) for the closest matching known color name. - 12/24 hour support- Option to show/hide date- Option to show/hide color nameSince this is our first app, with many more to come, we are releasing our first app, the What Color Is It watch face, for free. We hope everyone enjoys this watch face as much as we did making it.
descriptionHTML:
"What Color is it" takes the current time, converts it to a color for the background color, and then searches a database of more than 1,000 color names (more to be added soon) for the closest matching known color name.

- 12/24 hour support
- Option to show/hide date
- Option to show/hide color name

Since this is our first app, with many more to come, we are releasing our first app, the What Color Is It watch face, for free. We hope everyone enjoys this watch face as much as we did making it.
comments: All I got was blue and green And they all looked the same. Id like to come back to this one day.
Too small Brilliant concept but font is too small, even the time. Some color names are almost illegible, even when I wear glasses.
Yawn Green or teal...so not fun.
Winning!!! What sort of wizardry is this?
Concept is good but.... Concept is good but font is to small to recognize the time.. Overall is better
Cool.  When can I sey a colour and keep it?
recentChanges: Fixed overlapping date with the "OK Google" hot word hint.
